resources.string: This app help you to use mtk-su to launch Magisk on compatible devices, including locked down ones! It runs entirely from the data partition: no need to modify the firmware. Root is available for any app that wants it. But to manage root access for each application, you must download Magisk manager v7.1.1\n\n I really want to work with something that involves programming, if anyone has any opportunity please contact us, juniojsv@gmail.com
Do not update Magisk through Magisk Manager on a locked bootloader or you will brick your device. Including, i am not liable for any kind of damage to your device
